actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To provide that existing facilities located on a certain segment of the St. Joseph River in Branch County, Michigan, are not required to be licensed by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission under part 1 of the Federal Power Act.

summary.text: Authorizes Union City, Michigan, to operate and maintain a specified dam, including any works incidental to such dam. Declares that no license shall be required under the Federal Power Act with respect to such project works.

titles.title: To provide that existing facilities located on a certain segment of the St. Joseph River in Branch County, Michigan, are not required to be licensed by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission under part 1 of the Federal Power Act.
